feed.title: North Mountain (Cape Breton) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , North Mountain (Cape Breton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:43 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 01:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: -8.9°C
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -9.4°C
Wind: E 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
